abstract: A cornucopia of events in London around Halloween celebrate the macabre.
snippet: A cornucopia of events in London around Halloween celebrate the macabre.
lead_paragraph: There's more to the dark side of the English capital's history than that of the Tower of London. Around Halloween the city will come alive (so to speak) with the dead, as ghosts, ghouls and witches take to the streets for a weekend of spine-chilling revelries, from Oct. 29 to 31.

headline.main: On Halloween Weekend, Exploring London's Scary Side
